description_en: Welcome to Toki Pona Day!
description_tok: o kama pona tawa suno pi toki pona!

title_tok: toki uta pi sitelen Waso Mun
description_en: An illustrated poem telling the story of a young ruru owl and their search for friendship. I made this last year, with a focus on NZ flora and fauna :)
description_tok: sitelen ni li toki e alasa olin pi waso mun Ruru. ni li pali mi tan sike ma pini; ona li jo e kasi mute e soweli mute tan ma mi Awatejalowa (ma Nusilan :)

title_en: how a lipu tenpo is made

title_tok: musi pi tenpo pali musi: ilo Kuko
description_en: Interview and showcase with the devs behind the top ranked game from pali musi: "ilo Kuko"
description_tok: mi en mama pi musi ni li toki li musi: "ilo Kuko". musi ona li nanpa tu lon utala pi pali musi.

title_en: jan Tanijelun's first Toki Pona song translation
title_tok: ante toki nanpa wan pi jan Tanijelun tawa kalama musi
description_en: I'd like to share my literal first song that I translated in Toki Pona that I have yet to legitimately release. Intro, background story, and commentary included!
description_tok: ni li ante toki nanpa wan mi lon toki pona tawa kalama musi a. mi o toki e ijo monsi  kin lon ante toki ni a!

description_en: o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.
description_tok: o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.

title_en: Recapping the results of jan Niwe's Toki Pona Usage Form
title_tok: jan Niwe li lukin e alasa ona pi toki pona
description_en: Earlier this year in April, I sent out a form about toki pona usage that got over 100 responses! In this segment, I will cover these responses.
description_tok: mun nanpa tu tu pi tenpo sike ni la, mi pana e alasa pi toki pona tawa sina ale! jan mute a li pana e pilin ona. mi wile pana e ni tawa sina.

panelist: soweli suli Alu pi ko lete
title_en: lon li lon lon lon lon - Anti-Realism, Subjectivism, and Truth in toki pona
title_tok: lon li lon lon lon lon - weka pi lon wan en lon jan en lon pona
description_en: What is "lon" really? What is "real", "correct", and "true" anyway? Are those "lon"? Can there be an inherent, correct meaning for anything? What is logic, and how do toki ponists reason? Learn about all this and more!
description_tok: nimi Lon li seme? ante la, lon li seme? sona lon wan li ken ala ken? nasin lon li seme? jan pi toki pona li alasa e lon la, nasin ona li seme? o kama sona e ni e ante a!

description_en: jan wan li sitelen musi. jan ale ante li alasa sona e ni: sitelen li seme? musi a.
description_tok: jan wan li sitelen musi. jan ale ante li alasa sona e ni: sitelen li seme? musi a.

title_en: The Zaŋ language - a brief guide
description_en: An introduction to the Zaŋ language, where every string of valid syllables is grammatically correct and 4.7 million words are possible
description_tok: o kama sona lili e toki Zaŋ. toki Zaŋ la ale kalama li pona sona. toki Zaŋ li jo ~4,700,000 (kalama: "mute") nimi

description_en: I'll be showing off a couple of songs I've translated over the past couple months, and one (or two) more that I'm translating for SPTP! (content warning: some swearing)
description_tok: mi pana e ante toki mi pi kalama musi tan tenpo pini. kin la, mi pana e ante toki sin; ona li pali sin tan suno ni! (o sona e ni: unpa lili li ken lon)

description_en: o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.
description_tok: o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.

description_en: Come listen to jan Usawi perform their music and talk about art/other fun things!
description_tok: o kama kute e jan Usawi! mi pali e kalama musi mi li toki e ijo musi a ^^

description_en: o musi e toki kepeken lipu!
description_tok: o musi e toki kepeken lipu!

title_en: A Computational Analysis of Language Change in Toki Pona
title_tok: nasin nimi pi toki pona li ante seme lon tenpo?
description_en: I made a tool to learn about the changes in Toki Pona's words over time! I'll be talking about the tools I created, how they work, and what I learned from the data. Afterwards, I'll send out a page where you can look for changes yourself in the data!
description_tok: mi pali e ilo tawa ni: mi kama sona e ante nimi pi toki pona lon tenpo. mi wile toki e ilo mi e nasin pali e sona sin pi toki pona. mi pini la mi pana e lipu pi ken ni: sina kin li ken lukin e sona lon ilo sina!

title_en: Live and spontaneous Q and A
title_tok: sina wile sona la jan Sonja li pana e sona
description_en: sonja will read the chat and answer on the fly
description_tok: jan Sonja li lukin e toki sina li pana e sona ona

description_en: Live performance by la janbe (aka jan Sanpe) of music in various conlangs
description_tok: jan Sanpe li pana e kalama musi pi toki pali mute

title_en: how a lipu tenpo is made
why toki pona is hard (subject to change)
title_tok: toki pona li wile e wawa mute (mi ken wile ante e ni)
description_en: it's common knowledge that toki pona is the easiest language. or is it? I made a youtube video a recently about how I don't think this is true, but I didn't explain why. THIS video will explain why in detail.
description_tok: toki pona li wile e wawa seme? lon la, wawa mute. tenpo poka la mi toki e ni, taso mi toki ala e tan. tenpo NI la mi pana e sona e tan.

description_en: music you definitely haven't heard yet
description_tok: kalama sin la sina kute ala

title_tok: jan Nikoleta la tenpo pali musi
description_en: recording toki pona stuff
Interview and showcase with the devs behind the top ranked game from pali musi: 5
description_tok: mi en mama pi musi ni li toki li musi: "5". musi ona li nanpa tu wan lon utala pi pali musi.

title_tok: o kepeken toki Inli. o toki pona.
description_en: english is a huge part of the toki pona community, which is a bit funny because... just look at the name! why is that? how can we address that?
description_tok: toki Inli li suli mute lon kulupu pi toki pona. ni li musi mute tan ni: ni li kulupu pi _toki pona a_. ni li tan seme? nasin seme la mi ken ante e ni?

description_en: Come listen to jan Usawi perform their music and talk about art/other fun things!
description_tok: o kama kute e jan Usawi! mi pali e kalama musi mi li toki e ijo musi a ^^

description_en: jan Alin tells an old folktale from their homeland.
description_tok: jan Alin li pana e toki musi majuna tan ma mama ona.

title_tok: nasin Juniko la seme li lon?
description_en: An update on the effort to encode sitelen pona in Unicode!
description_tok: mi pana e sona ni: mi alasa pana e sitelen pona tawa nasin Juniko la seme li kama?

title_tok: musi pi tenpo pali musi: alasa soweli
description_en: Interview and showcase with the devs behind the top ranked game from pali musi: "alasa soweli"
description_tok: mi en mama pi musi ni li toki li musi: "alasa soweli". musi ona li nanpa wan lon utala pi pali musi.

title_en: kalama musi sin pi toki pona (o tawa musi!)
description_en: ala Lojewalo is a new musician in the toki pona community, soon to release a toki pona album with collaborations from jan Usawi and jan Sonja. Hear the songs live!
description_tok: ala Lojewalo li jan kalama sin lon kulupu pi toki pona. tenpo poka la ona li pana e kalama kulupu sin! jan Usawi en jan Sonja li lon kalama kulupu. o kute e kalama tan ala Lojewalo!

title_en: Cosplay and Trans identity: A toki pona-only discussion of research
title_tok: musi len en kon tonsi: toki penpo pi alasa sona
description_en: nasa Lipuli provides a discussion of her undergraduate research, and personal experience, with the connection between trans identity formation/performance and the cosplay community
description_tok: toki musi ni la nasa Lipuli li toki e lipu suli ona pi alasa sona pi tomo sona suli. lipu ni li toki e linluwi pi musi len pi kon tonsi pi pali tonsi.

description_en: I'll do a reading of the first chapter of Alice in Wonderland translated into Toki Pona by me
description_tok: mi wile toki e sitelen musi ni tawa sina: jan Alisu lon ma nasa

description_en: jan wan li sitelen musi. jan ale ante li alasa sona e ni: sitelen li seme? musi a.
description_tok: jan wan li sitelen musi. jan ale ante li alasa sona e ni: sitelen li seme? musi a.

description_en: a translation of the sequentially drawn story by Randall Munroe
description_tok: jan Randall Munroe li pali e toki musi pi sitelen mute la mi pana sin e ona kepeken toki ni

panelist: jan Apen + jan Upmost + jan Alin + kala Asi
title_tok: jan tu tu li kalama musi pona tan toki ante!
description_en: jan Apen covers Gila Monster by KGatLW! jan Upmost covers Can't Stop Singing! jan Alin covers "Der Mond ist aufgegangen"! kala Asi covers "What is autumn?"!
description_tok: jan tu tu li kalama musi pona tan toki ni^ ante!

description_en: Toki Pona Day is drawing to a close... let's end it with a bang!
description_tok: suno pi toki pona li kama pini... ona o pini pona!
